messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Due to the current threat of a bomber shutting down cloaning, it is IMPERITIVE that we find and apprehend the culpret. As of now it is allowed AND EXPECTED for heads of staff to search those of there department. Upon finding suspicous contraband, they are then to IMIDEANTLY alleart security, a.k.a. me. Refusal of a search from your DEPT HEAD will be considered insubortination and will be dealth with accordingly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: SM took out the tcomms, also it didnt produce tesla or singulo so we're kinda screwed for power now

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed very low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
